subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Bryant University accepted an invitation to join the N.C.A.A. Division I Northeast Conference. Bryant currently competes in Division II. It is in the first year of a five-year transition period for full Division I membership. Full membership, including eligibility for Division I championships, will take effect September 2012. The university, located in Smithfield, R.I., said it expected to play a Division I schedule in 2008-9.
